activities: Premier Research International LLC, its subsidiaries and affiliates provide a broad range of services to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device industries on a global basis. During the conduct of its operations, Premier Research may collect and process data relating to study participants, clinical research investigators and their staff, medical and healthcare professionals, customers, vendors, contractors, consultants, in addition to human resources data. Due to the global nature of its business, Premier Research may transfer personal data between members of the European Union and the United States.
address: Centre Square West, 1500 Market Street, Suite 3500
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA) for other than human resources data; EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for human resources data only; Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for human resources data from Switzerland only.
